# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int = 10)
    # 将字符串分割成单词列表
    words = split(str)

    # 返回分割后的新字符串
    return join([prefix_with_newline(word) for word in words])
end

function prefix_with_newline(word::AbstractString)
    # 如果当前行长度超过文本宽度，则在单词前插入换行符
    if current_line_length + length(word) > text_width
        return "\n" * word
    else
        # 否则直接返回单词
        return word
    end
end
```

使用示例:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello world! This is a long sentence that needs to be wrapped.")
"Hello world!\n This is a long sentence that needs to be wrapped."
```
